description:
UPDATED April 2016: My Udemy courses have been taken by 1,000s of students and have been awarded 100s of positive reviews.

My “WHY” – You know that feeling you get when you help someone? I want to feel that way 1,000,000 times.

Come with me on a journey to Social Media Marketing Automation: You will save hours and become more effective.

What if you could...

  • Auto schedule social media content weeks and months in advance
  • Have evergreen, high quality content shared on your Twitter account 24/7
  • Discover and share VIRAL content in matter of seconds
  • Have your blog shared on social media channels automatically
  • Automatically curate and schedule social media content from reliable sources

Thats exactly what you will learn in this course. I work with 100s of social media marketing clients and marketing automation helps me save time and be more effective. Without automation its hard to scale social media efforts.

After completing this course, you will

  1. Have your own social media automation strategy (I will share my template with you)
  2. Start saving hours of your time on social media marketing channels
  3. Know several tools to pick from for your own social marketing automation

This course does come with a 30day money back guarantee. There is nothing to lose and If you don't learn anything new, you can get a refund. Go ahead and click on TAKE THIS COURSE button above and I will see you on the inside.
title: Social Media Automation
